main event: On January 7, 1951, an unidentified aircraft was sighted over Honolulu, T.H. by Lt. H., who observed a large, cigar-shaped object with a trailing mass of muddy orange flame.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 88 seconds., The object was traveling at a high rate of speed and appeared to be motionless intermittently., The size of the object was estimated to be 40-50 feet long., The mass of flame trailing the object was about 25 feet in length., Two days prior to the sighting, other unidentified flying objects were reported over the island of Oahu.
sighted object: a large, white, cigar-shaped object with a muddy orange colored flame trailing it
witness description: Lt. H., a military officer with experience in observation and reporting.
